      • getNumMatchingRecords

        public int getNumMatchingRecords(IDataFilter filter)
        Description copied from interface: IRecordDataStore
        Computes the (potentially approximate) number of records matching the given filter. Since the returned value can be approximate and the number of matching records can change before or even during the actual call to IRecordDataStore.getRecordIterator(IDataFilter), the exact number of records can only be obtained by counting the number of records returned by the iterator next() function.
        Specified by:
        getNumMatchingRecords in interface IRecordDataStore<DataKey,IDataFilter>
        Parameters:
        filter - filtering parameters
        Returns:
        number of matching records
